results.headline: ‘Last Summer’ Review: Growing Pains
results.summary_short: Sunny days turn to sweaty nights on the Mediterranean coast in this Turkish coming-of-age film that follows a teenage boy who pines for his older sister’s best friend.

link.suggested_link_text: Read the New York Times Review of Summer '96
